author: dblevins
msg: Added a bat version of the validate script.  The tool isn't fully ready, but
is still pretty useful, so a bat script is nice.

author: dblevins
msg: A few patches to the quickstart doc.

author: dblevins
msg: Added some tests explicitly for exception handling.  We do have tests that
involve exception handling already, but these tests just do a simple check

author: dblevins
msg: Ripped out the transaction rollback test.  It seemed to be working in version
1.7.  Rather than revert to version 1.7, I decided to leave it broken and comment
the test out.  The code should work, so rather than fix the code I would like
to see if we can't pin down the problem in the Remote Server.
